game.name: DCS: A-10C Warthog - The Enemy Within 3.0 Campaign
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Captions available, VR Support, Partial Controller Support, Includes level editor
game.shortDescription: The Enemy Within 3.0 is a complete remake of the critically-acclaimed The Enemy Within campaign for the A-10C Warthog. This story-driven campaign puts you in cockpit of the Warthog as part of a small, 6-ship US detachment sent to Georgia.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Enemy Within 3.0 is a complete remake of the critically-acclaimed The Enemy Within campaign for the A-10C Warthog. This story-driven campaign puts you in cockpit of the Warthog as part of a small, 6-ship US detachment sent to Georgia.
